item.title: How to work with HUGO ?
item.description: 1. Basics To create a basic HTML website using Hugo you need 2 files a 1 folder. config.yml layouts/index.html example layouts/index.html <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <title>Hello World</title> </head> <body> <h1>Hello World</h1> </body> </html> jsdnjfnsd heheh heheh Now you can ask hugo to server your website by running hugo server

item.title: My first content file
item.description: Web Developer & Data Scientist Iâ€™m Farhanuddin, a software developer and data scientist based in Minnesota, USA, with a passion for solving complex problems through innovation and technology. My journey began in India, where I earned my Bachelor’s in Computer Science, and it led me to Minnesota, where I completed my Master’s. Along the way, I’ve honed my skills by working on a variety of projects that seamlessly blend creativity with technical expertise, turning intricate challenges into simple, effective solutions.
